subject: Feature 3: Auto Skill Score + Confidence Meters
description:
Implement real skill scoring from pose metrics:
1. Compute skillScore (0-100) from pose consistency, recovery speed, form quality
2. Derive confidence from landmark visibility (not invented numbers)
3. Add SkillMeter component with badge + confidence bar
4. Remove manual level selection UI
5. Update Gemini prompts to reference computed metrics
